tasks.task: Understand and implement smart agriculture solutions
subtasks: Research and stay updated on government initiatives in smart agriculture
Familiarize with emerging technologies such as IoT, cloud, and AI in agriculture
Learn about the integration of AI and IoT in crop monitoring
Understand the role of an expert decision system in generating irrigation schedules
Learn to set up and monitor environmental and crop information through sensors
Utilize data from monitoring devices to inform intelligent irrigation programs
Implement water-saving irrigation practices using AI technology

tasks.task: Promote precision agriculture through technology integration
subtasks: Recognize the value of precision agriculture in the agricultural value chain
Advocate for the adoption of AI solutions in farming practices

tasks.task: Manage field monitoring and services using advanced technologies
subtasks: Setup and maintain field monitoring capabilities with IoT devices
Utilize AI for analyzing field data and improving management decisions
Provide enhanced services to farmers through integrated solutions MAINTASK: Enhance crop growth monitoring through intelligent solutions
Learn to monitor crop status using AI-driven monitoring systems
Adjust irrigation schedules based on real-time crop needs and environmental factors

tasks.task: Reduce irrigation costs through efficient water management
subtasks: Optimize water usage in agricultural practices
Lower costs associated with traditional irrigation methods

tasks.task: Increase precision in agricultural operations
subtasks: Use AI and IoT to achieve precise volume control for irrigation
Tailor the growing environment to the specific needs of crops
